programme.title: Kamp Koral

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Wacky Wednesday: When one of Simon's inventions malfunctions, Jeanette and Alvin switch places and now each must live as the other.

programme.desc: What A Gem: When Alvin sees a sparkling diamond buried in his neighbour's rose garden, he's sure she's responsible for the recent diamond heist. So, Alvin sets about proving it. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Who's the Animal: During a costume visit to the zoo, Alvin finds himself mistaken for a real Tasmanian devil. Soon, Alvin is stuck in the cage and the real animal goes home! (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Lucha Fever with the Casagrandes: Ronnie Anne fakes being sick to watch a Lucha Libre match, which proves to be more difficult than anticipated. (S4, ep 5b)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Washed Up: The Louds rent a boat for a relaxing day trip on the lake, but the family ends up marooned on a desert island. (S4, ep 6a)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Any Given Sundae: Lily hears her parents mention ice cream if the kids are good, so she uses baby smarts to avert sibling disasters. (S4, ep 7b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Sick Day: Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention. (S4, ep 11b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Theo Knows Best: When Theodore finds a winning lottery ticket, everyone has their own ideas on how the money should be spent.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.desc: Roughin' It: Lincoln is worried that he's lost his manliness from growing up with all sisters, so he and Clyde go camping. (S1, ep 20a)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Patching Things Up: Lola and Lana try out for Bluebell Scouts but discover one of them might be more suited for it. (S2, ep 6a)

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Awn i'r goedwig law i gwrdd 'r Broga Dart Gwenwynig ac i waelod y mor i gwrdd 'r Chwyddbysgodyn a'r Pysgodyn Llew. We meet the Poison Dart Frog, the Puffa Fish and the Lion Fish.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wrth i Benja edmygu Lili am ei bod mor alluog, mae Guto'n teimlo nad ydi'r ddau ei angen o bellach. When Benja is impressed by Lili's cleverness, Guto thinks they no longer need him.

programme.title: Ahoi!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd, a heddiw mae'n ofni y bydd ei foch coed yn hedfan i ffwrdd ar y gwynt. Pablo thinks he'll float away if he puts down his pinecones - uh oh!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Edrychwn ar hanes y camera a sut mae'r ddyfais arbennig yma wedi newid a datblygu ar hyd y blynyddoedd. We'll look at the history of the camera, which has changed a lot over the years.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn

programme.title: Stiw

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur

programme.title: Tomorrow
programme.desc: 1972. Drama. Directed by Joseph Anthony. Stars Robert Duvall, Olga Bellin & Sudie Bond. A lonely farmer takes in a pregnant drifter, but things take an unexpected turn after she gives birth. [S]

programme.title: Incident in Shanghai
programme.desc: 1938. Drama. An unhappy wife of the head of The Red Cross in Shanghai falls for a pilot (Patrick Barr). The pilot is wounded and the husband must operate. [S]

programme.title: Once a Thief
programme.desc: 1935. Drama. Down on his luck inventor Roger (John Stuart) 'borrows' some money from a handbag he finds but things go wrong when a necklace from the bag goes missing. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Bookies at the Crossroads
programme.desc: 1964. An interesting study of the present state of bookmakers in England, their possible future, and competition represented by the tote.

programme.title: Beauty and the Barge
programme.desc: 1937. Comedy. Directed by Henry Edwards. Stars Gordon Harker, Judy Gunn, Jack Hawkins & Margaret Rutherford. Ethel is taken in by a barge skipper to the fury of the widow he is courting. [S]

programme.title: A Question of Suspense
programme.desc: 1961. Crime Drama. Directed by Max Varnel. Stars Peter Reynolds, Noelle Middleton & Yvonne Buckingham. A young woman sets out to get revenge against a rich man who murdered her lover. [S]

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: 1956. Drama directed by Vernon Sewell and starring Jack Warner, Thora Hird, Harry Fowler and Kathleen Harrison. Based on 'The Huggetts' family rivalry when two sons win the football pools. [S]

programme.title: Mark of The Phoenix
programme.desc: 1957. Crime drama directed by Maclean Rogers and starring Anton Diffring. Crooks steal a secret metal formula and plan to smuggle it into East Germany. [S]

programme.title: Three Silent Men
programme.desc: 1940. Crime. An inventor of a deadly weapon to be used against the allies is injured in a crash. Surgeon, Sir James (Sebastian Shaw) saves his life but learns of his plot. Stars Derrick De Marney. [S]

programme.title: Sparrows Can't Sing
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director: Joan Littlewood. Stars James Booth, Barbara Windsor & Roy Kinnear. Charlie returns to the East End after two years at sea to find his house demolished and wife Maggie gone. [S]

programme.desc: Bubble Surprise: Bubble goes above and beyond trying to help out with her guests' mysterious party plans - nearly ruining her own surprise party. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Masha and the Bear Shorties
programme.desc: Selfie / Dance, Dance / Roller-Skater / Modern Art / Picnic: Rose is trying to take a selfie, get many likes, and become more popular than her neighbours. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unfriended?: Red or yellow? Masha and the Bear argued which colour is more beautiful, and a wall grew between them. All this turns into exhausting competition of searching new friends. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fisherman's Luck: The Bear has a rival for fishing - a Cat with the latest equipment. An unspoken competition begins. Will it be the latest technology, a time-tested method or... Masha? (S6 Ep10)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Like Mother, Like daughter: Masha is playing mother and daughter with Rosie. But this time an honest lot distributed the roles. It's Masha's turn to put on her cap and get in the stroller. (S6 Ep11)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Blown Away: Masha finds someone's umbrella in the forest and decides to urgently return it. After a fun search, the owner of the umbrella is found, but why is he so dissatisfied? (S6 Ep12)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Who's Gifted?: Christmas is a time of miracles and gifts. All inhabitants prepared performances for Santa Claus, but Masha was the best prepared. Does the wizard have enough gifts for her? (S6 Ep13)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Smells Fishy: Robbery of the century! The ever-hungry Wolves managed to unhook a huge tank for transporting live fish from the train. But there was a strange passenger among the fish. (S6 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha and the Bear Shorties
programme.desc: Come on Let's Share / Stylish Swim / Traffic Blues / February / March: What is the most satisfying thing to do with a big bowl of fresh and delicious cucumbers? (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Wild Horse Heroes: When a young foal goes missing from a herd of wild horses in Patagonia, Jett and Team Dizzy help a girl named Nayla go on a search and rescue mission. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Treehouse Trouble: Daniel in Canada asks Jett for a tool kit to build a treehouse for his dad, but a melting glacier causes a flood of the nearby river! (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Baursaki Blast Off: Maxim gets Jett to bring a package of Kazahk doughnuts to give to his mum, an astronaut travelling to the moon. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: Lost in the Everglades: When a toy jet gets blown off course it seems like the young owner will never get it back. That is until Jett calls Mira's Wild Team. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Junior Build: Ms. Motors and the class go on an exciting field trip to a local construction site where they get to meet the whole construction crew. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Harry Hoodini: When local magician Harry Hoodini visits the Motorsorri to put on a show, Frannie takes it upon herself to prove to the class that magic isn't real. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Helpful Halle: After Halle saves a runaway balloon she is featured on the news and becomes a local celebrity. (S1 Ep47)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cuzzy Carson: When Cory's older cousin comes to visit, Cory tries to replay all the old games they used to play together when he was Chrissy's age, even though he's twice as big now. (S1 Ep48)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bedtime Story: The Carson family makes up a bedtime story for Chrissy. (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Yipta Cartinez: Cory, Freddie, and Halle struggle to communicate with Carlos and Carmina's "sobrina", their niece, who is visiting from out of the country and doesn't speak English. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Care Bears: The Quest for the...
programme.desc: ...Rainbow Stone: Togetherness is about to become an official Care Bear in a ceremony. But Cheer gets so excited that she accidentally breaks the magical stone needed to give Togetherness her colour!

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Pasta La Vista: Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha or Dasha? As usual, Bear will have to solve the girls' dispute. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Love Is In The Bear: Ah, love! Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear and dreams of winning her heart. But Masha is also here! Will her interference in the affairs of the heart lead to? (S5 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Wish Upon A Star: Wow, it's another New Year! Masha has a lot of experience in organising unforgettable celebrations, so she takes matters into her own hands. (S5 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Firefighter of the Day: Wow, that's really something! Masha saves Bear from a fire! And a grateful Bear makes her a gift - a toy fire truck. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Awesome Blossoms: Bear's garden has been overtaken by dandelions! As Bear fighting against the weeds, Masha doesn't get why he is throwing them away. After all, dandelions can be beautiful! (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Sleeping Beauties: Masha is the best "mommy" in the world, but even she cannot put Rosy to sleep. Bear offers a solution: a music box. However, the music box holds a surprise inside it! (S5 Ep19)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The House That Grows And Grows: Raoul is worried about his parents' plans to move. Ollie draws a strange house. It looks tiny from the outside, but once they get inside, it's much bigger. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Witch Who Fell From The Sky: Raoul wakes up from a nightmare, and Ollie is drawing a forest. Suddenly, a little girl seems to fall from the sky. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Super Treasure Island: Petula wishes she were rich so she could travel to faraway places, so Ollie draws her a treasure island. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Photo Safari: The MiniWhats have presentations to prepare for school. Ollie draws a car and they set off on a safari to prehistoric times. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Class Trip To The Moon: The class trip is the same every year. If only they'd go to the moon for a change... Ollie draws a rocket and off they go! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: Desperately Seeking Pixie Dust: Except for Mixo, the MiniWhats don't like eating vegetables. Ollie draws a table, and they find themselves at Giacommo's. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: The Concert: When Billy and JC discover that, when Scott was young, he gave concerts with Miss Goatie and Old Jack, they decide to do the same - that very evening! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: A Priceless Treasure: Jostled by Tough Cookie at the general store, Billy inadvertently knocks over a clock, which breaks. To his surprise, he discovers a small treasure map inside. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: We Must Save Mr. Cassidy: Scott has organised a big garage sale at the ranch. Billy is sorting through his things and struggling to part with his old toys; who knows where they will end up? (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster
programme.desc: Pancho, the King of the Lasso: Deedee Rabbit and his little brothers have made friends with Pancho, a cowboy whose lasso throwing is allegedly even better than Jessy Dog's! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Battle Of The Fangs: The Wolfies start their own band - trouble is, they're reaching octaves they've never reached before, creating new levels of destruction with their sonic howls. (S4 Ep46)
